meta.Author: Eileen St. Clair

across.question: The first woman, in Greek myth.
Scott hero, slain at Flodden Field.
"His sins were scarlet, but his books were ___.”

down.question: Like William, in "As You Like It.”
He said, "I think no virtue goes with size.”
